title: Просмотр видео
content: После последнего обновления, заметил, что в полноэкранном режиме перестала пропадать панель задач вондовс10. В других браузерах хром, яндек, тор, опера, проверял, - все работает корректно. Проблема только в мазиле. Перезагрузка проводника, перезагрузка браузера, компьютера и т.д не помогает.

title: الحمايه المتقدمه
content: اريد ازاله الحمايه المتقدمه لاني فقدت. الدخول من التطبيقات الي المتصفح بسهوله اريد ربط متصفحي الخاص بكل التطبيقات والمحافظ الخاصه بي تلقائيا وبسهوله ومزامنه بياناتي مع كل تطبيقاتي والتليجرام وبقيه منصات التداول والحصول علي اموالي ومكافاتي بسهوله ساعدني باازله الحمايه المتقدمه تسببت لي المشاكل بعدم المزامنه وربط التطبيقات الخاصه بي بلمتصفح الويب وساعدني علي الترجمه في كل التطبيقات الي اللغه العربيه لغتي المفضله لكي استطيع فهم ماينبغي عليا القيام به بسهوله واصلاح الاخطاء والمشاكل تلقائيا
creator: basmbasmdyny

title: Screen stutter after nothing update on screen for a bit
content:
After letting Firefox idle for a bit (like 5 seconds) and nothing playing on the screen, when I come back, it causes screen stuttering for my whole desktop. Disabling hardware hardware acceleration doesn't help much.

OS: Arch Linux x86_64 Kernel: Linux 6.14.5-arch1-1 Display (CMN1521): 1920x1080 @ 144 Hz in 15" [Built-in] WM: Hyprland 0.49.0 (Wayland) CPU: 12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-12700H (20) @ 4.70 GHz GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Mobile [Discrete]
creator: louiszn269

title: Bigpond emails inbox
content: Bigpond email Inbox failed 28/4/25, apparently due to Bigpond outage. Outage has been fixed, but no new emails received in Inbox since 28/4/25, although can access through Telstra Webmail, but very difficult and, with my minimal technical skills, am unable to access attachments through that link. Need to reinstate normal Inbox.
creator: peter.kahn

title: reloading web page during debugging the page
content:
I'm debugging some web sites, and I often need to reload a page to see if a change I made on the server works correctly. On iPads and Android devices, this doesn't seem possible. Yes, there are the circular-arrow buttons, but they only work with Firefox (and Chrome;-) on my MacOS or my linux server, but not on my iPads or Android gadgets. They act like they're doing something, but the page on their screen doesn't change. (With FF or Chrome on the "real" computers, it does change). The only advice I find online is to use CTL-R or something similar but those "devices" don't have CTL buttons. Nothing else I guess at works, either.

When I ask online, I get replies that work for linux, MacOS or Windows, but clearly saying "iPad or Android doesn't help; the answers don't apply to those systems.

Am I missing something? Web developers need ways debug their code or html or whatever they're working on, and this requires checking how it works on the actual users' screens.
creator: jc1742

title: tab groups don't work as advertised
content:
The article at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/tab-groups says (and shows a mockup animation) to drag a tab onto another tab to create a tab group. It also says the feature is being rolled out in v137 and will be available to all users by May 6.

It's May 8, and I'm using v138, but dragging a tab onto another tab just reorders the tabs.

What's the deal?
creator: davidmitchumbrown

title: Lost ALL my bookmarks after backing up
content:
I had dozens and dozens of bookmarks saved, which I backed up a few days ago, and saved the .json file to my desktop.

When I went to open them this morning, they were all gone. I imported the file to restore them, but none of my saved bookmarks returned. It seemed to import a state from 2024.

I have scoured these forums and tried everything that was sugggested, even tips from different forums.

Did this happen because I didn't have a Mozilla account (until now)?

Please please help. I don't have any profile data saved on my computer and I need my bookmarks back!
creator: scott.allira
